name: Tank Defense Division
description: Tank Defense Division is an arcade-like strategy game. In which players battle foreign tanks to test their own mettle. The game coming with both a single player campaign and coop. Along with a diverse selection of Levels, Enemies, and Game modes to Explore, Battle, Build upon, and Share.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or Higher DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1800 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Dual Core Intel or AMD CPU Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Discrete Graphics card with Direct X 11 support. DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1800 MB available space
